item.description:
March 17-26 for the comp
March 26- April 6 for the after-party

(gotta love when the after-party is longer than the comp, eh?)

Apparently part of the deal with the after-party is that they are opening all the features to the public. I haven't been able to find a schedule of events through the comp or after-party, but was thinking maybe the weekend of March 22-23 would be a good time to get up there. That way we can see some of the riders, but I am SURE they will have a good nightlife schedule throughout the Open too.

This great idea comes to you curtesy of new member Kirstin
item.how_to_find_us: Ay, got to think about that one
item.name: US Open
